data.title: John Carradine Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about John Carradine on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature John Carradine including The Ten Commandments, The Man Who Shot Liberty Vâ¦
data.text:
Johnny Yuma

Johnny Yuma returns home one year after the war's end to find a gang of thugs have extorted a local mine and murdered his father while his father's deputy and the rest of the town live in fear and despair.

Herman's Raise

When Herman is forced to work overtime at the parlor, Lily grows furious and convinces him that he deserves a raise. In addition to the fact that they can use the extra money, Lily tells Herman that his years of loyalty to Mr. Gateman, his boss, should not be passed off without reward. However his boss doesn't see things the same way and fires Herman for demanding a raise.
